channel.title: How do I IP Ban someone from my server?
channel.description: I know how to do everything else i just need to know how to IP ban someone because he wont quit making new names... I own the server too so i know i need somethin in the folder probably.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 04:13:07 PM[/size][hr]Oops this one got double posted... Just use this topic

item.title: How do I IP Ban someone from my server?
item.dc:creator: @xsaberjrx xsaberjrx
item.description:
@xsaberjrx wrote:

I did that and they still came back on with teh same IP i checked.

item.title: How do I IP Ban someone from my server?
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

Go into your connected from folder, and click on the user you want to ipban.

Copy there address, then go into the data folder and enter the ip into bannedips.txt.

Read full topic
